eu.amidst.core.distribution

Class UnivariateDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.distribution.ConditionalDistribution
        • eu.amidst.core.distribution.UnivariateDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeltaDistribution, GaussianMixture, Multinomial, Normal, Uniform

    public abstract class UnivariateDistribution
extends ConditionalDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class ConditionalDistribution. It defines and handles the set of univariate distributions.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/#bnmodifyexample

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
